page.title: 05BALLOCHYLE ESTATE.
page.content: {Ballochyle Estate}is mostly hilly land and is attractive. It covers about {575 acres}mostly for cattle and sheep farming. 5% of the land is managed by the Econonomic Forestry Group.{ Mr. {Manuel }owns the other 95% of the estate. He also owns Dalinlongart and Ballochyle Farms which are on the estate. The two farms sell hay, sheep, cattle and wheat. Dalinlongart Farm is rented out. Mr. Manuel checks on the sheep for illnesses and if the deer and foxes increase too much in number he shoots a few. On the estate is Ballochyle House where Mr. Manuel's family live. 8 workers live in homes around the estate and the other houses are rented out.{
